step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your fingers open as instructed.
You are stretching your arm overhead. Try to open your fingers wider.
You are making a fist and pushing down. Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together and inhaling.
You are stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Relax your muscles fully.
You are relaxing your arms. Ensure a smooth transition to the next repetition.
Second repetition started well. Remember to keep fingers open.
You are stretching your arm overhead. Continue to focus on opening your fingers.
Good fist and push down motion. Try to inhale and really engage your shoulder blades.
You are extending arms overhead and exhaling. Ensure you are fully relaxing.
Relaxation is good. Prepare for the next set or to conclude the exercise.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open when stretching your arms overhead and to actively squeeze your shoulder blades together as you push down. Focus on breathing with each movement.
